bibliography:
Beauvoir, Simone de, 1989 [1949], The Second Sex, trans. H.

Benjamin, Jessica, 1988, The Bonds of Love, New York:

–––, 1998, Like Subjects, Love Objects, New

Brennan, Teresa, 1992, The Interpretation of the Flesh:

–––, 1993, History after Lacan, New York:
Routledge.

Chodorow, Nancy, 1978, The Reproduction of Mothering:

Cixous, Helene and Clement, Catherine, 1986 [1975], The Newly

Dinnerstein, Dorothy, 1976, The Mermaid and the Minotaur: Sexual

Freud, Sigmund, 1968, The Standard Edition of the Complete

–––, 1968 [1895], Studies in Hysteria, in
The Standard Edition, vol. II.

–––, 1968 [1905], Three Essays on the Theory of
Sexuality, in The Standard Edition, vol. VII.

–––, 1968 [1913], Totem and Taboo, in The
Standard Edition, vol. XIII.

–––, 1968 [1914], “Remembering, Repeating, and

–––, 1968 [1921], Group Psychology and the Analysis

XVIII.

–––, 1968 [1923], The Ego and the Id, in The
Standard Edition, vol. XIX.

–––, 1968 [1925], “Some Psychical Consequences of
the Anatomical Distinction Between the Sexes,” in The
Standard Edition, vol. XIX.

–––, 1968 [1930], Civilization and Its
Discontents, in The Standard Edition, vol. XXI.

–––, 1968 [1931], “Female Sexuality,” in
The Standard Edition, vol. XXI.

–––, 1968 [1933], “Femininity,” in The
Standard Edition, vol. XXII.

Gallop, Jane, 1982, The Daughter's Seduction, Ithaca:

–––, 1985, Reading Lacan, Ithaca: Cornell

Grosz, Elizabeth, 1990, Jacques Lacan: A Feminist

Irigaray, Luce, 1985a [1974], Speculum of the Other Woman,

–––, 1985b [1977], This Sex Which is Not One,

–––, 1993a [1984], An Ethics of Sexual

–––, 1993b [1987], Sexes and Genealogies, trans.

–––, 1993c [1990], Je, Tu, Nous: Toward a

–––, 1994 [1989], Thinking the Difference,
trans. Karin Montin, New York: Routledge.

–––, 1995a, “‘Je—Luce

–––, 1995b, “The Question of the Other,” in

–––, 1996 [1995], I Love to You: Sketch of a

–––, 2001 [1994], Democracy Begins Between Two,
trans Kirsteen Anderson, New York: Routledge.

Klein, Melanie, 1984a, Love, Guilt and Reparation and Other

–––, 1984b, Envy and Gratitude and Other Works

Kofman, Sarah, 1985 [1980], The Enigma of Woman: Woman in

Kristeva, Julia, 1982 [1980], Powers of Horror: An Essay

–––, 1984 [1974], Revolution in Poetic

–––, 1986, “Women's Time,” in The

–––, 1987 [1983], Tales of Love, trans. Leon S.

–––, 1989 [1987], Black Sun: Depression and

–––, 1991 [1988], Strangers to Ourselves,

–––, 1998, “The Subject in Process,” in

–––, 2002 [1997], Intimate Revolt: The Powers and

–––, 1991a [1975], The Seminar of Jacques Lacan, Book

–––, 1998 [1975], The Seminar of Jacques Lacan, Book

–––, 2006 [1970], Ecrits, trans. Bruce Fink, New

Beauvoir, Simone de, 2010 [1949], The Second Sex, trans. Constance
